# Smaller Games

> smaller weirder games.

Experimental games and fidgets.

## Pages

- [Home](https://smallergames.com/): Gallery landing page listing all available games and fidgets
- [One](https://smallergames.com/one): "Dice Fidget" - an interactive dice roller with physics-based loot. Roll polyhedral dice (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20, d100), build up energy, and collect loot cubes that drop into a bucket with realistic physics.

## Technical Details

- Static site hosted on GitHub Pages
- No frameworks - pure HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript
- Uses Rapier physics engine (WASM) for loot cube physics
- Accessibility-focused with ARIA labels and screen reader support
- Respects `prefers-reduced-motion` with a warning for users who have it enabled
